author: rivals.com
title: * Four-star Edwards going back and forth * Alley: Take two
text:
* Four-star Edwards going back and forth
* Alley: Take two off the board
* Four-star wide out Robinson won't sign with Florida
* Inside Scoop on weekend official visitors
* Cassidy: Four-star Edwards to Florida?
* Take Wyatt off the board
* GET TWO FREE MONTHS ACCESS
Florida has recruited defensive linemen well for a long time and the Gators just added another big piece to the puzzle Tuesday in four-star Elijah Conliffe . The Hampton, Va. standout chose Florida over Tennessee one day before National Signing Day.
IN HIS OWN WORDSâ€¦
"I really love Florida and my mom loves Florida," Conliffe said. "It's a great staff and they have a great campus. It's a really good place.
"I felt really comfortable with the players and being around everything," he said. "I feel pretty close with Kyree Campbell , my host for my official visit.
"Coach Mac ( Jim McElwain ), coach Chris Rumph , and all the coaches will help me become the best player I can be," said Conliffe. "They'll coach me hard."
RIVALS' REACTION
Conliffe is a big lineman with good athleticism and impressive power. He makes a surprising number of plays in the backfield and he's able to change directions quickly for a player of his size. Once he gets on campus, he will have to reshape his body and get used to the speed of the game. Conliffe could see time in certain situations as a freshman, but he will be an important player for Florida down the road.
Edit
